WorkItem.Description:
Hi All,
 
I have created the excel file using the phpExcel on live server but when I gonna open it it say : 
"fileName.xls can not be opened. The file may be read only, or you may be trying to access a read-only location. Or, the server the document is stored on may not be respondin".
 
Even I checked the test files that are in zip on live server, Locally they are working fin on Wix with WAMP, but on live server they are showing this error. 
 
Please rep, how can I resolve this issue
 
Regards,
WorkItem.Summary: File on Live Linux Server Get Corrupted

Comments.Message:
Hi,
Strange behavior is observed, I tested same file on one other server, it worked fine, no error,  seems there is some issue in server configuration php.ini file or ???

anyone have an idead ??

thnx,
Regards,
Have you checked the obvious like file permissions, safe mode settings, etc. on the live server
